
= Middle click links =

Description

   This script must be deployed into the ~/.surf/user.js and one will be
   able to open link in a new window with middleclick or with control
   click.
(function() {
        window.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                if (
                      e.button == 1 // for middle click
                      //|| e.ctrlKey   // for ctrl + click
                   ) {
                        var new_uri = e.srcElement.href;
                        if (new_uri) {
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.preventDefault();
                                window.open(new_uri);
                        }
                }
        }, false);
})();
